hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #time#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bow# and #a Map of the Bottom of the Well#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest
